amendment.description: To accelerate the phasein of the deduction relating to income attributable to domestic production activities.

action.text: By Unanimous Consent, Amendment SA 2686, previously agreed to as amended by Amendment SA 2687, was modified to reflect the amendment as having been agreed to without amendment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2686 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2686 proposed by Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S2211; text: CR S2211) To accelerate the phasein of the deduction relating to income attributable to domestic production activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2686 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2686 proposed by Senator Bunning.
